scripts.build: npm run build-docs && npm run build-changelog
scripts.build-docs: npm run build-docs-v2 && npm run build-docs-v3
scripts.build-docs-v2: cd docs-v2 && bundle exec middleman build --clean && mkdir -p ../build/v2 && cp -R build/. ../build/v2
scripts.build-docs-v3: cd docs-v3 && bundle exec middleman build --clean && mkdir -p ../build/v3 && cp -R build/. ../build/v3
scripts.build-docs-v2:watch: npx nodemon -w docs-v2/source -e md -x "npm run build-docs-v2"
scripts.build-docs-v3:watch: npx nodemon -w docs-v3/source -e md -x  "npm run build-docs-v3"
